text: @HillaryClinton Hillary, my son, my only, is going back to work in July in a Casino in Blackhawk, CO. I'm a hospice nurse already had COVID-19 & struggled to stay out of ER-no insurance, very sick! So scared I'll lose my son...I'm saying this to you- will kill him if something happens to my son!
